name: Bunny (FATMAN)
description:
A game I made for a jam between me and my friends in 3 days, and it is my first game. game controls: 
keyboard: (a) & (d) to move / (space) to jump / (e) to shoot / (r) to restart .
controller: (dpad) to move / (x) to jump / (square) to shoot / (start) to restart.
enjoy.
